title: Valentines Day
body:
For Valentines day I would like to take Chief Swiffer out on a date at Bronze 5. Meet me at 4 PM for afternoon dinner.

~With love, RawrSaidAPear

replies.body: So why isn't anyone taking out JustTrash for dinner?
I'll have a chocolate bar in my mouth and instead of carrying you to the door i can carry you from unranked to bronze5? Think about it snuggums
